title: When was Legion Stadium built and what all uses have occured there over the years? I remember motorcycle races and car races, also race horse training many years ago. Also I wonder who sponsored the raceing?
text:
Legion Stadium was built in 1934 as a W.P.A. project. I'm assuming
it was named for the American Legion, but I couldn't verify that
yet.
